scenario.name: UAC Fork Auth Branch
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[service]@sip.jambonz.xyz SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:01734904798@sip.easybell.de>;tag=5BE094B3-69385E7400071A89-B08DD6C0 To: <sip:[service]@sip.jambonz.xyz> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 10 INVITE Contact: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=- 1 1 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=sipp c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

ACK sip:[service]@sip.jambonz.xyz SIP/2.0 [last_Via:] From: <sip:01734904798@sip.easybell.de>;tag=5BE094B3-69385E7400071A89-B08DD6C0 To: <sip:[service]@sip.jambonz.xyz>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 10 ACK Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[service]@sip.jambonz.xyz SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch]-auth From: <sip:01734904798@sip.easybell.de>;tag=5BE094B3-69385E7400071A89-B08DD6C0 To: <sip:[service]@sip.jambonz.xyz> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 11 INVITE Contact: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 [authentication] Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=- 1 1 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=sipp c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

ACK sip:[service]@sip.jambonz.xyz SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch]-auth-ack From: <sip:01734904798@sip.easybell.de>;tag=5BE094B3-69385E7400071A89-B08DD6C0 To: <sip:[service]@sip.jambonz.xyz>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 11 ACK Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] From: <sip:01734904798@sip.easybell.de>;tag=5BE094B3-69385E7400071A89-B08DD6C0 To: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Content-Length: 0
